description:
Emma Mattresses

Wake up feeling epic on one of our award-winning mattresses!
Featuring the highest quality foams and made using the most advanced technologies.

Available in single size mattress, king single size mattress, double size mattress, queen size mattress, and king size mattress.

  • Top Scoring Mattress 2021 and 2022 by CHOICE®
  • 100 Night Sleep Trial
  • Rated 4.7 out of 5 stars in ProductReview
  • Designed and dedicated for Australian sleeper
  • Perfect for all types of sleepers
  • Innovative Airgocell® regulates temperature
  • High-quality foams adapt to your body
  • Ensures your sleep remains uninterrupted
  • Option to upgrade to hypoallergenic covers
You can test the Emma Mattress for 100 nights from delivery to decide whether or not you are satisfied with it. If you realise that Emma is not the right mattress for you, simply contact Emma Sleep's customer service team at [email protected] to arrange a pick-up. Everyday Market will process a refund for 100% of the purchase price on behalf of Emma Sleep (the seller). Given current circumstances, Emma Sleep's courier partner requires that your Emma Mattress be wrapped in its plastic packaging prior to collection. Emma Sleep would also appreciate if the mattress is returned in good condition. Any mattress that has mould, dirt, stains, smells, or bed bug infestations are no longer eligible for a mattress return nor replacement under the 100 Night Trial.
This 100 Night Trial is provided by Emma Sleep, the seller of this product. The terms of this trial and any decisions (including refund decisions) in relation to this trial are made by Emma Sleep and not by Woolworths or Everyday Market.
10-Year Guarantee
Each Emma Comfort Mattress comes with a 10-Year Guarantee, ensuring the longevity and quality of the mattress core.
Free Delivery & Easy Returns
You don't have to worry about paying to get the Emma Comfort Mattress to your home. It is delivered quickly, free of charge. And if Emma isn't for you, we give you a full refund. Simply use our return portal to start the refund process.
name: Emma Sleep 1EA
